pageContext.claim: “Brad, why did they put the votes in three times? You know, they put ’em in three times.”
pageContext.analysis: “Mr. President, they did not put that,” Raffensperger replied. “We did an audit of that, and we proved conclusively that they were not scanned three times.”  A hand count “showed that there was no problem with the machine scanning,” Georgia elections official  Gabriel Sterling told reporters. “If somebody took a stack of ballots and scanned them multiple times, you would have a lot of votes with no corresponding ballots.”
